diff_hunk:
@@ -654,6 +667,9 @@ if(BUILD_CAFFE2)
     # Caffe2 proto files
     install(DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/caffe2 DESTINATION ${PYTHON_LIB_REL_PATH}
             FILES_MATCHING PATTERN "*.py")
+    # Pick up static data files (used for serialized operator tests)
body: I agree with @ezyang - we shouldn't need to install these test files. Make sure you can run the tests from the source code location and you should be good. In fact, all of the CMakeLists.txt changes shouldn't be needed. Thank you for thinking about the installed case, though!
